channel.title: Eon 317
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://eonrsps.com/assets/img/logo.png[/img][/CENTER]
[URL=http://"http://www.eonrsps.com/IPB"]FORUMS[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.eonrsps.com"]LANDING PAGE[/URL] [URL=http://"https://www.dropbox.com/s/aj9xbsvl42dkrsz/Eon.jar?dl=0"]CLIENT DOWNLOAD[/URL]
Eon is a newer 317 economy server looking to please players in every way possible. Here at Eon, our main goal is to give our players an experience to look back upon. An experience that 40 years down the road you're still looking back and saying "Wow I had a lot of fun on that, I wish I could still play it." But for us to achieve this goal and to help our players achieve their goals, WE NEED YOU. We want YOU to come and try out the server and see if you like it. There is quite a bit of content already added in but we are always trying to add more. We consider every suggestion made to us and if it's worth having we do it. Eon has a very friendly community and a small player base which is increasing daily.
Some features include....
Skills [SPOILER=Skills]Fishing Woodcutting Mining Smelting Smithing Fletching Herblore Agility Firemaking Crafting Fishing Cooking Prayer Summoning Runecrafting Hunting Slayer / Duo Slayer[/SPOILER]
Minigames
[SPOILER=Minigames]Barrows Fight Caves Fight Pits Blast Furnace Pest Control Castle Wars Duel Arena[/SPOILER]
Bosses [SPOILER=Bosses]King Black Dragon Armadyl Bandos Saradomin Kalphite Queen Avatar of Destruction (Nex Items) Barrelchests Dagannoth Kings Tormented Demons Chaos elemental Corporeal Beast[/SPOILER]
Other Features [SPOILER=Other Features]Pk Points System Auto Voting Auto Donations 24/7 VPS Website Decent xp rate C Key Person Plenty of shops Training teleports PK teleports Slayer Duo Slayer Completionist Cape XP Lamps Clue scrolls Ring of wealth 1 Bil Coin Help command Prestige system Prestige shop Vote shop Donator shop Clan chat Player Names New hp bar x10 Damage Hitsplats toggle Gameframes (474, 480, 508, 525, 562) Dicing Kill streaks Custom titles Donator zone Money pouch Bank tabs[/SPOILER]
Media
[SPOILER=Media][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/oLXv4Mi.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/RIOBcaM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Zejl5xj.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZcMttgP.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Yhl1Qiu.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/aoCr6Le.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/FlpJICi.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Jl8iZZt.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/LeUq5EW.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/f866kEo.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/b98Y7HY.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Wm9HO77.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/9JKVMt4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/l7zE9Jz.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/wbYGPO2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/cc71L2Z.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ezObuMn.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VldSYXm.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/n66HOKt.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/kcanoEv.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/AwyZ7ir.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/uvaayXn.png[/img][/SPOILER]
Remember, it all starts with YOU. Come play Eon today!
